title: White Filament Bulbs Explained | Tech Check with Vlad from the Lab
description:
We get asked all the time: ‘What’s a white filament bulb?’ 💡So we sent in our resident scientist to explain.​

The verdict: white filament = same function, way better looking. 💡 Even when it’s off, it’s sleek, seamless, and far from your typical yellow-dot LEDs. #SimplyBetter #CreeLightingHome #CreeLighting #HomeDecor #InteriorDesign

title: White Filament Bulbs Explained | Cree Lighting
description:
Upgrade your home lighting with Cree White Filament bulbs! Now you can choose between a white filament or yellow filament for the perfect aesthetic—without affecting the light color itself. Enjoy a warm, cozy, and authentic glow that enhances any room, while keeping your design stylish and seamless. Energy-efficient and long-lasting, Cree Lighting White Filament bulbs combine modern technology with classic design, making them ideal for homes, offices, and decorative fixtures alike!

title: Switch Mode Explained | 5 Shades of White in 1 | Cree Lighting
description:
Discover Cree Lighting’s innovative Switch Mode technology! With Switch Mode, you can cycle through 5 shades of white light—Soft White, Warm White, Cool White, and more—simply by toggling your wall switch on and off. No more guessing which color temperature to buy—one bulb does it all! Perfect for reading, relaxing, or setting the ideal ambiance in any room. Upgrade your lighting experience with Cree Lighting today!

title: POV your favorite light bulbs just landed at Lowes #creelighting #home #lighting #interiordesign
What Is Color Temperature? | How Lighting Changes the Look & Feel of Your Space
description:
#creelighting #interiordesign #lightingsolutions 

Ever wondered why some lights make a room feel cozy and warm, while others make it feel bright and energizing? It all comes down to color temperature—measured in Kelvins (K)—and it has a big impact on the mood, style, and functionality of your space.

In this video, we’ll break down:
✅ What color temperature means (warm white vs. cool white vs. daylight)
✅ How color temperature changes your space and feel
✅ How our Switchable White bulbs let you get every single color temperature in one bulb

Whether you’re setting up a home office, creating a cozy living room, or brightening up your kitchen, understanding color temperature can help you transform your space instantly.

title: How to Choose the Right Light Bulb | Cree Lighting Buyer’s Guide
description:
Choosing the right light bulb can transform your space, but with so many options, it can get confusing. In this video, we break down everything you need to know to pick the right bulb for your needs. Learn about bulb shapes, base types, color temperature, and matching bulbs to your specific use cases. Whether you’re lighting up a cozy living room, a productive workspace, or outdoor areas, we’ve got you covered with our expert tips.

🔹 Bulb Shapes explained
